alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 14 at 6:47AM PST until January 14 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...West winds 10 to 20 mph expected with gusts up to 35 mph. * WHERE...South Central Elko County including Pequop Summit. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind observations show strong gusts impacting areas prone to hazards from westerly winds, including Pequop Summit. Observations and reports show portions of the advisory area seeing car accidents from deteriorating conditions from the wind.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
